name: full_grid_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool local_rank_tracker.
Tool description: Fast and Reliable geolocation rank tracker API - get Google My Business ranking across the local area, broken up into a grid.
API description: Performs a full grid search and retrieves the ranking of a specific business at each coordinate point within the grid. The grid cells in the results are ordered from left to right and then top to bottom.

radius.description:
The distance between coordinate points (on the same row / column in the grid). The units of the radius are determined by the **distance_units** parameter.

**Allowed values:** 0.1-100.
**Default:** 1

lat.description: The latitude value for the grid center coordinate point.

grid_size.description: The size of the grid (e.g., 3x3, 5x5, 7x7). Allowed values are odd integers between 3 and 15.

place_id.description: The Google Place ID of the business to match against in results.

lng.description: The longitude value for the grid center coordinate point.

x_user_agent.description: The device type for the search. Default is `desktop`.

zoom.description:
Google Maps zoom level to use for search on each grid point.

**Allowed values:** 0-18.
**Default:** 13.

radius_units.description:
Distance measurement units to use for the radius parameter (kilometers / miles).

**Allowed values:** km, mi.
**Default:** km.
